BasicInfo.short: Dictionary.com is an online dictionary that provides definitions, synonyms, antonyms, origins, audio pronunciations and example sentences.

Products.name: Thesaurus.com
Products.description: Thesaurus.com is an online platform that provides users with over 550,000 synonyms and a suite of tools, which simplify the writing process.
